name: Marvel Pinball
description:
MARVEL® Pinball lets you relive the greatest moments of classic Marvel® Universe Super Heroes on a set of brand new pinball tables! Use your pinball wizardry to summon each Super Hero's signature moves in an epic pinball adventure!

MARVEL® Pinball features state-of-the-art ball physics, stunning visuals, social connectivity and exciting new features:

-Four beautifully crafted tables: Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man and Blade
-Choose to compete against your friends to achieve the highest Hero Score™, or team up with them to really show off your Team Force™
-Exciting multiplayer modes, including local, online, and worldwide competitions
-New tables will be released regularly through the PlayStation®Store
-MARVEL® Pinball features three trophies for each table

Help the Marvel® Super Heroes rid the universe of villains, and be the true Pinball Hero of the day!

Marvel and all related characters: TM & © 2010 Marvel Entertainment, LLC and its subsidiaries. Super Hero(s) and Super Villain(s) are co-owned registered trademarks. Licensed by Marvel Characters B.V. www.marvel.com. All rights reserved.
